text: Plagiostyles is a plant genus in the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1897.Pierre, Jean Baptiste Louis. 1897. Bulletin Mensuel de la Société Linnéenne de Paris 2: 1326Tropicos, Plagiostyles Pierre It is native to tropical Africa.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;SpeciesThe Plant List, genus Plagiostyles # Plagiostyles africana (Müll.Arg.)
